title: Galaxy Buds Pro Review: semi-pro
tags: galaxy buds pro vs galaxy buds live
galaxy buds pro vs airpods pro
samsung galaxy buds pro vs apple airpods pro
description: The Galaxy Buds Pro are Samsungs newest wireless earbuds. They come in Phantom Silver, Phantom Violet, and Phantom Black and are available today for $200. With solid microphones, a slim design, and decent battery life, these earbuds have kept all of the good parts of the Galaxy Buds that have come before them. But what earns them their Pro title are all their extra features.
